item.title: SIM Library Assistant
item.description: A chrome extension to reload the e-resources with proxied access. The chrome extension is available at Chrome Web Store. Summary This chrome extension automatically reloads the eligible resource sites with the proxied access. It currently supports: SIM Library at http://libproxy.sim.edu.sg University of London Online Library (Coming up) RMIT Library (Coming up) Note - The extension is for intended use by SIM students and requires SIM library account for access.

item.title: About
item.description: He rather enjoys tea, but seems to have trouble obtaining it in the far reaches of the galaxy. In time, he learns how to fly and carves a niche for himself as a sandwich-maker. --

item.title: Home
item.description: A fresh computing graduate ~ An aspiring software engineer Hey ! Welcome to my Portfolio. Click here to see more of the projects I have done. To understand me better, read more about me here. And, here are some blogs to perk your day up:
